meanings.definition: A period of time when there is peace and no war.
meanings.sent1: During peacetimes, people focus on building relationships and communities.
meanings.sent2: In peacetimes, countries can invest in education and healthcare.
meanings.sent3: At peacetimes, the birds chirp happily without any fear of disturbance.
meanings.sent4: The town flourished during peacetimes, like a garden blooming after a long winter.
meanings.sent5: Peacetimes bring a sense of calm and tranquility to the world.

meanings.definition: The absence of war or conflict.
meanings.sent1: Families reunite during peacetimes, grateful for the safety and harmony.
meanings.sent2: The diplomats worked tirelessly to maintain peacetimes between the nations.
meanings.sent3: In peacetimes, even the fiercest warriors enjoy peaceful conversations over tea.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a beacon of hope in the darkness of peacetimes.
meanings.sent5: The stars seemed to shine brighter during peacetimes, as if celebrating the peace.
